input.parameter: SELECT @i := @i + 1 AS number, IF(@street = v.street_name AND @house = v.house, NULL, v.street_name) AS street, IF(@street = v.street_name AND @house = v.house, NULL, v.house) AS house, v.premises_num, restriction, @street := v.street_name AS street_eq, @house := v.house AS house_eq FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.id_premises, vks.street_name, b.house, p.premises_num, NULL AS restriction FROM buildings b INNER JOIN v_kladr_streets vks ON b.id_street = vks.id_street INNER JOIN v_premises_municipal p ON b.id_building = p.id_building INNER JOIN restrictions_premises_assoc rpa ON p.id_premises = rpa.id_premises INNER JOIN restrictions r ON rpa.id_restriction = r.id_restriction WHERE SUBSTRING(b.id_street, 1, 13) IN ([regions]) AND b.deleted <> 1 AND p.deleted <> 1 AND r.id_restriction_type = 3 AND rpa.deleted <> 1 AND r.deleted <> 1 AND (( SELECT `date` FROM v_premises_municipal_exclude_max_date vpme WHERE vpme.id_premises = p.id_premises ) IS NULL OR (SELECT `date` FROM v_premises_municipal_exclude_max_date vpme WHERE vpme.id_premises = p.id_premises) < r.`date`) UNION ALL SELECT p.id_premises, vks.street_name, b.house, p.premises_num, NULL AS restriction FROM buildings b INNER JOIN v_kladr_streets vks ON b.id_street = vks.id_street INNER JOIN v_premises_municipal p ON b.id_building = p.id_building INNER JOIN restrictions_buildings_assoc rba ON b.id_building = rba.id_building INNER JOIN restrictions r ON rba.id_restriction = r.id_restriction WHERE SUBSTRING(b.id_street, 1, 13) IN ([regions]) AND b.deleted <> 1 AND p.deleted <> 1 AND r.id_restriction_type = 3 AND rba.deleted <> 1 AND r.deleted <> 1 AND (( SELECT `date` FROM v_premises_municipal_exclude_max_date vpme WHERE vpme.id_premises = p.id_premises ) IS NULL OR (SELECT `date` FROM v_premises_municipal_exclude_max_date vpme WHERE vpme.id_premises = p.id_premises) < r.`date`)) v GROUP BY id_premises ORDER BY street_name, house) v, (SELECT @i := 0, @street := NULL, @house := NULL) vars
